Tax Invoice

{% for item in doc.items %} {% if item.custom_is_companny_provided_item == 0 %} {% endif %} {% endfor %} {% set sales_list = frappe.db.get_all("Sales Invoice", filters={'customer': doc.customer}, fields=['*'], order_by='posting_date desc, posting_time desc', limit=5) %} {% set sales_ledger = frappe.db.get_all("GL Entry", filters={'party': doc.customer, 'voucher_type': "Sales Invoice", "is_cancelled": 0}, fields=['debit'], order_by='posting_date desc, creation desc') %} {% set journal_ledger = frappe.db.get_all("GL Entry", filters={'party': doc.customer, 'voucher_type': ["in", ["Journal Entry", "Payment Entry"]], "is_cancelled": 0}, fields=['credit'], order_by='posting_date desc, creation desc') %} {% set a = namespace(jl_amt=0, sl_amt=0) %} {% for jl in journal_ledger %} {% set a.jl_amt = a.jl_amt + (jl.credit or 0) %} {% endfor %} {% for sl in sales_ledger %} {% set a.sl_amt = a.sl_amt + (sl.debit or 0) %} {% endfor %} {% set b = namespace (count= 0) %} {% for sales_invoice in sales_list %} {% if sales_invoice.status != "Cancelled" %} {% set b.count = b.count + 1 %} {% endif %} {% endfor %} {% set customer_details = frappe.db.sql(""" SELECT sii.item_code, si.customer, SUM(sii.qty) AS total_qty, SUM(sii.custom_return_qty) AS total_return_qty FROM `tabDelivery Note Item` sii JOIN `tabDelivery Note` si ON sii.parent = si.name WHERE si.customer = %(customer)s AND sii.custom_is_companny_provided_item = 1 GROUP BY sii.item_code, si.customer """, {"customer": doc.customer}, as_dict=True) %} {% for return_item in customer_details %} {% endfor %}
{% set company_doc = frappe.get_doc("Company",doc.company) %} {% set currency_format = frappe.db.get_single_value("System Settings","number_format") %} {% set bank_details = {} %} {% set upi_id = namespace(value="") %} {% set bank_name = namespace(value="") %} {% set paid_amount = namespace(value=0) %} {% for doc in company_doc.bank_details_for_printing %} {% if doc.print_label == "UPI ID" %} {% set upi_id.value = doc.print_value %} {% elif doc.print_label == "Bank Name" %} {% set bank_name.value = doc.print_value %} {% else %} {% set _ = bank_details.update({doc.print_label: doc.print_value}) %} {% endif %} {% endfor %} {% if doc.rounded_total %} {% set paid_amount.value = frappe.utils.cint(doc.rounded_total) - frappe.utils.cint(doc.outstanding_amount) %} {% else %} {% set paid_amount.value = frappe.utils.cint(doc.grand_total) - frappe.utils.cint(doc.outstanding_amount) %} {% endif %} {% set paid_amount.value = frappe.utils.fmt_money(amount=paid_amount.value, format=currency_format, currency=company_doc.default_currency) %}
{% if doc.outstanding_amount != 0 and upi_id.value != '' %}
{% set upi_qr_text = 'upi://pay?pa=' ~ upi_id.value ~ '&tn=' ~ doc.name ~ '&cu=INR' %} {% if doc.outstanding_amount < 100000 %} {% set upi_qr_text = upi_qr_text ~ '&am=' ~ doc.outstanding_amount %} {% endif %} {{ web_block('UPI QR Code', values={'upi_qr_text': upi_qr_text }) }}
